description: This file defines a Python class 'YouTubeTools' that provides utilities for interacting with YouTube videos, including fetching video data, captions, and timestamps using external APIs.

classes.name: YouTubeTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for YouTube-related functionalities such as fetching video data, captions, and timestamps.

methods.name: get_youtube_video_id
methods.description: Extracts the YouTube video ID from a given URL.

methods.name: get_youtube_video_data
methods.description: Retrieves metadata about a YouTube video, such as title, author, and thumbnail.

methods.name: get_youtube_video_captions
methods.description: Fetches captions/subtitles for a YouTube video.

methods.name: get_video_timestamps
methods.description: Generates timestamped transcript snippets for a YouTube video.
